text: Daniel Te'o-Nesheim (; born Daniel Nesheim, June 12, 1987 â€“ October 29, 2017) was a Samoan American football defensive end. He was drafted by the Philadelphia Eagles in the third round of the 2010 NFL Draft. He played college football at Washington. He was born in Pago Pago, American Samoa. On October 30, 2017, Te'o-Nesheim was reported to have died at the age of 30. After his death, an autopsy revealed that Te'o-Nesheim had been suffering from chronic traumatic encephalopathy (CTE). ==References== Category:1987 births Category:2017 deaths Category:American Samoan sportspeople Category:Philadelphia Eagles players Category:American football defensive ends Category:Tampa Bay Buccaneers players
title: Daniel Te'o-Nesheim
